ticker: Thank you all so much for your support over the last three years, and here's to many more!
Make sure to join our NEW VRChat group! https://vrc.group/BASS.2844
Due to celebratory excitement, there is a reduced service on all lines. - We're just on tonight and finishing early!
Happy 4th of July to our American passengers this evening!

performers.name: Kishi
ticker: 'Bass Goat ate the bass, we're working it out'

performers.name: Wrath
ticker: Final DJ of the night is now departing early!
'The trajectory of the sun and the moon tells me that it's going to be a good night'

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here due to reduced service so the staff can go watch things explode.
See you next week for more music!
Passengers celebrating this evening are requested not to set off fireworks within the station - You may have noticed there is a roof, this won't end well.
